1.name: Paris Blues
1.description: During the 1960s, two American expatriate jazz musicians living in Paris meet and fall in love with two American tourist girls.

2.name: West Side Story
2.description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

3.name: Breakfast at Tiffany's
3.description: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

4.name: The Parent Trap
4.description: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

5.name: Two Rode Together
5.description: A corrupt marshal is pressured by his army friend into negotiating the release of white captives of the Comanches, but finds that their reintegration into society has its consequences.

6.name: The Guns of Navarone
6.description: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.

7.name: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
7.description: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

8.name: The Hustler
8.description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

9.name: Judgment at Nuremberg
9.description: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

10.name: The Misfits
10.description: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.

11.name: Yôjinbô
11.description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

12.name: The Innocents
12.description: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

13.name: Mr. Sardonicus
13.description: A search for a winning lottery ticket in his dead father's grave causes Sardonicus' face to freeze in a horrible grimace, until he forces a doctor to treat his affliction--with even more ...                See full summary »

14.name: One-Eyed Jacks
14.description: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

15.name: Splendor in the Grass
15.description: A fragile Kansas girl's love for a handsome young man from the town's most powerful family drives her to heartbreak and madness.

16.name: El Cid
16.description: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

17.name: The Comancheros
17.description: Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teamed with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves known as Comancheros.

18.name: Blue Hawaii
18.description: After arriving back in Hawaii from the Army, Chad Gates defies his parents' wishes for him to work at the family business and instead goes to work as a tour guide at his girlfriend's agency.

19.name: Såsom i en spegel
19.description: Recently released from a mental hospital; Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family and their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.

20.name: Mysterious Island
20.description: During the Civil War a group of Union soldiers and two Confederates escape the stockade using a hot air balloon and end up on a strange Pacific island.

21.name: The Children's Hour
21.description: A troublemaking student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of being lesbians.

22.name: A Thunder of Drums
22.description: The trials and tribulations of bitter veteran Captain Maddocks and argumentative rookie Lieutenant McQuade at a cavalry desert outpost.

23.name: One, Two, Three
23.description: In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.

24.name: A Weekend with Lulu
24.description: Fred, Tim and Deirdre plan a fun weekend break on the coast. What they didn't make allowances for was the company of Deirdre's mother who insists on coming along as her daughter's chaperone.

25.name: Flower Drum Song
25.description: A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.

26.name: L'année dernière à Marienbad
26.description: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

27.name: La notte
27.description: A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.

28.name: Viridiana
28.description: Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.

29.name: Lover Come Back
29.description: A series of misunderstandings leaves an advertising executive with a campaign for a product which has not yet been invented, while he romances his rival in the guise of its inventor.

30.name: A Taste of Honey
30.description: A pregnant teenage girl must fend for herself when her mother remarries, leaving the girl with only a new male friend for support.

31.name: Pit and the Pendulum
31.description: In the sixteenth century, Francis Barnard travels to Spain to clarify the strange circumstances of his sister's death after she had married the son of a cruel Spanish Inquisitor.

32.name: Something Wild
32.description: A young rape victim tries desperately to pick up the pieces of her life, only to find herself at the mercy of a would-be rescuer.

33.name: Come September
33.description: Younger generation vs. "older" folks on vacation at an Italian villa.

34.name: Mosura
34.description: A giant, ancient moth begins to attack Japan when coming to the rescue of its two, foot-tall worshippers who were taken by shipwreck survivors.

35.name: King of Kings
35.description: The temporary physical life of the Biblical Savior, Jesus Christ.

36.name: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
36.description: When the Earth is threatened by a burning Van Allen Radiation Belt, U.S. Navy Admiral Harriman Nelson plans to shoot a nuclear missile at the Belt, using his experimental atomic submarine, the Seaview.

37.name: Pocketful of Miracles
37.description: A New York gangster and his girlfriend attempt to turn street beggar Apple Annie into a society lady when the peddler learns her daughter is marrying royalty.

38.name: A Raisin in the Sun
38.description: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

39.name: Une femme est une femme
39.description: A French striptease artist is desperate to become a mother. When her reluctant boyfriend suggests that his best friend impregnate her, feelings become complicated when she accepts.

40.name: Il colosso di Rodi
40.description: While on holiday in Rhodes, Athenian war hero Darios becomes involved in two different plots to overthrow the tyrannical king, one from Rhodian patriots and the other from sinister Phoenician agents.

41.name: The Day the Earth Caught Fire
41.description: When the U.S. and Russia unwittingly test atomic bombs at the same time, it alters the nutation (axis of rotation) of the Earth.

42.name: The Curse of the Werewolf
42.description: In 18th Century Spain, an adopted boy becomes a werewolf and terrorizes the inhabitants of his town.

43.name: Barabbas
43.description: Barabbas, the criminal that Pontius Pilate induced the populace to vote to set free, so that Christ could be crucified, is haunted by the image of Jesus for the rest of his life.

44.name: Divorzio all'italiana
44.description: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.

45.name: The Roman Spring of Mrs. Stone
45.description: An aging actress travels to Rome with her husband; after he suddenly dies during the flight, she begins a passionate affair with a young gigolo.

46.name: The Absent Minded Professor
46.description: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

47.name: The Ladies Man
47.description: After his girl leaves him for someone else, Herbert gets really depressed and starts searching for a job. He finally finds one in a big house which is inhabited by many, many women. Can he ...                See full summary »

48.name: Town Without Pity
48.description: Four American soldiers stationed near a German village face death in the rape of a local girl, and are defended by outside counsel Major Steve Garrett.

49.name: Fanny
49.description: A love triangle between a young woman, a rich 60-something man and an aspiring sailor set in early 20th century Marseilles.

50.name: Taste of Fear
50.description: A wheelchair-bound young woman returns to her father's estate after ten years, and although she's told he's away, she keeps seeing his dead body on the estate.
